This means:

Segment model (0), Genomelength=100, 128 tumor cells, read tree from file (1), 100 healthy cells
Rate of deletion = 0.001, rate of amplifications = 0.001, mean deletion length = 10, mean amplification length = 10

length of edge leading to root of tree = length of simulation time for single cell = 1

Then comes the tree to simulate for in Newick format
This tree is maximally imbalanced and not ultrametric. Terminal branch lengths decay logarithmically

0.08 0.07 7.5 6 0.1
